description: "The **List Subscriptions** endpoint allows you to retrieve a list of all active subscriptions within your organization. Use this endpoint to track and manage your organization's ongoing subscriptions with its customers."

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List Subscriptions"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/subscriptions"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The **List Subscriptions** endpoint allows you to retrieve a list of all active subscriptions within your organization. Use this endpoint to track and manage your organization's ongoing subscriptions with its customers.

> ðŸ“˜ Note
> 
> A subscription is created automatically when a customer makes a payment on a recurring plan. Use this endpoint to track all active subscriptions.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"customer_id","in":"query","description":"Retrieve a list of subscriptions for a particular customer.","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"status","in":"query","description":"Retrieve subscriptions based on their respective status.","schema":{"type":"string","enum":["Pending","Future","InTrial","Active","Paused","Expired"]}},{"name":"after","in":"query","description":"Retrieve subscriptions after this timestamp.","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"before","in":"query","description":"Retrieve subscriptions before this timestamp.","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"limit","in":"query","description":"Maximum number of subscriptions to retrieve per page (default=100).","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"maximum":100}},{"name":"page","in":"query","description":"Page number of the results to retrieve (default=1).","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1}},{"name":"since","in":"query","description":"Retrieve subscriptions since this timestamp.","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"sort","in":"query","description":"Sort order for the retrieved subscriptions (ascending or descending).","schema":{"type":"string","enum":["asc","desc"]}},{"name":"until","in":"query","description":"Retrieve subscriptions until this timestamp.","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
